api.title: Something went wrong. Call our Helpline and we will figure it out together.
api.detail: We're sorry, currently we cannot continue to arrange accident insurance in Smart Banka.

contractDisagree.title: We need your consent to continue
contractDisagree.detail: Do you have any questions? Don't hesitate to contact us.

accidentInsuranceIntro.title: Accident Insurance
bullets: Accident insurance for children, adults and families valid globally.
Double benefits in case of a traffic accident.
Children receive double benefits during all school holidays.
From 129 CZK/mon. Depending on the selected bundle (Junior, Single, Family).
accidentInsuranceIntro.detail: Insurance helps offset the financial impact of receiving treatment and the subsequent recovery after an accident.
accidentInsuranceIntro.note: Accident insurance is provided in cooperation with BNP Paribas Cardif Pojišťovna, a.s.

options.title: Junior
options.description: Insurance for you and your child in case you need to take care of them and/or accompany them while they are hospitalized. With double benefits during all school holidays and in case of a car accident.

limits.title: Junior: Select Benefits

values.title: Permanent Disability
values.alternativeTitle: During school holidays and in case of a car accident

values.title: Surgery as a result of an accident
values.alternativeTitle: During school holidays and in case of a car accident

values.title:
Hospital stay after an accident
+ subsequent recovery
values.alternativeTitle: During school holidays and in case of a car accident

values.title: Caring for a family member after an accident
values.alternativeTitle: During school holidays and in case of a car accident

values.title: Hospital stay with a child after an accident
values.alternativeTitle: During school holidays and in case of a car accident

limits.detail: The final amount to be paid out after an accident is determined as a percentage of contractual benefits based on the severity of the accident/injury,
limits.terms: What is covered and what are the limits?

values.title: Coverage expires:
values.value: When the child turns 27 years of age

values.title: Insurance expires:
values.value: On the last day of the calendar year in which the child turns 27 years of age.

options.description: For you, your partner and children. Children receive double benefits during all school holidays and in case of a car accident.

values.title: Age:
values.value: 18–65 years of age for adults, 0–18 years of age for children.

values.title: Coverage expires:
values.value: At 70 years of age for adults. At 18 years of age for children.

values.title: Insurance expires:
values.value: On the last day of the calendar year in which the insured person turns 70 years of age or children turns 18 years of age.

accidentInsuranceJunior.title: Accident Insurance: Child
accidentInsuranceJunior.info: Birth Number must include the digits after the slash.
accidentInsuranceJunior.checkbox: I hereby confirm, that I am arranging insurance for my own (or adopted) child of 0-18 years of age.

accidentInsuranceSummary.title: Check the information below
accidentInsuranceSummary.sourceAccountTitle: The insurance will be paid from
accidentInsuranceSummary.paymentDueValue: the following month of arrangement, the premium will be deducted from your account no later tha on the 5th business day of the month.
accidentInsuranceSummary.checkbox: I confirm that I have read and understood Insurance Terms and Conditions
accidentInsuranceSummary.checkboxNotDisabled: I, as the owner of the Current Account, confirm, that I do not suffer disability of I.-III. degree.
accidentInsuranceSummary.info1: Carefully read the Accident Insurance information materials, which set out the exclusions and limits of insurance coverage.
accidentInsuranceSummary.info2: The contractual documentation will be sent to you in electronic form. You can receive a physical copy at any MONETA Money Bank branch
